data.title: Appaloosa Grill
data.meta_description: Appaloosa Grill is an American restaurant on 16th Street Mall in the heart of downtown Denver. Daily happy hours and live music nightly!
data.text:
Testimonials

Birthday Party: "We had a wonderful time that evening. Our service was awesome and the food great as usual."

Graduation Party: "Everything was AWESOME at The Horse. Service was great, foods was great...awesome. :) Thanks for checking in and I would use Appaloosa again for sure."

Rehearsal Dinner: "We had a wonderful time at the Appaloosa Grill for the rehearsal dinner! Thank you so much for al of your help getting the evening set up. The whole weekend was amazing!"

Holiday Event: "We had a very ice time at the event and the staff was very friendly and attentive. The food was delicious and everyone enjoyed themselves."

Holiday Company Lunch: "We wanted to let you know that we had a fabulous time at our Christmas Party. Everything was delicious."

Company Event Dinner: "Thank you so much! It was wonderful! If we are ever back in Denver, we would love to hold our events there!"

Group Coming to Enjoy the Music and Dance: "It was great! We'll def do it again."

Dinner for Convention Group: "Guy and the folks working with him that night did a great job for us. The event was a success."
